title: The best iPhone SE deals available in February 2018
description:
![iPhone SE
deals](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Want to bag yourself a tidy discount on the popular[iPhone
SE](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/iphone-se)? Here’s our roundup of
the very best iPhone SE deals money can buy this month – plus some bonus
discounts on us.**

Whether you’re after a big data deal that will give you plenty of time playing
on the iPhone SE, low as possible monthly payments or simply the best value
deal overall, there should be an option below that jumps out at you.

Here are some of our top iPhone SE picks this month for starters:

  * [**5GB deal on iD**](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=14879965153&a=277673&m=2264&clickref=tr-mobiledeals-iphonese) – £15.99/month | 300 mins & 5000 texts _([Carphone Warehouse](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=14879965153&a=277673&m=2264&clickref=tr-mobiledeals-iphonese))_
  * [**2GB deal on EE**](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=13061381785&a=277673&m=380&clickref=tr-mobiledeals-iphonese) – £22.99/month | unlimited mins & texts _([Mobiles.co.uk](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=13061381785&a=277673&m=380&clickref=tr-mobiledeals-iphonese))_
  * **[5GB deal on EE](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=20444893061&a=277673&m=422&clickref=tr-mobiledeals-iphonese)** – £27.99/month | unlimited mins  & texts _([e2save](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=20444893061&a=277673&m=422&clickref=tr-mobiledeals-iphonese))_

iPhones have come a long in the past year, with the [iPhone
8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/deals/best-iphone-8-deals-3260322), [iPhone
8 Plus](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/best-iphone-8-plus-deals-3289474)
and the pricey [iPhone X](https://www.trustedreviews.com/deals/best-iphone-x-
deals-3289493) entering the scene. So is the iPhone SE still a worthy choice
for your next phone upgrade?

In short, yes – at least we think so, anyway. The cute and compact 2016 iPhone
has water-resistance, stereo speakers, a wide colour gamut screen and a
cracking battery life.

Prices on the iPhone SE have also dropped since the new trio of iPhones
arrived, so it’s an obvious choice if you’re after an iPhone but can’t afford
the latest flagship prices.

Most of the iPhone SE deals on this page are free or incredibly cheap upfront,
so you only have to worry about a monthly price plan – and there are some
absolute bargains knocking about now that 2018 is here.

**Related:[Best iPhone 7 deals](https://www.trustedreviews.com/deals/best-
iphone-7-deals-2993225)**

## Best iPhone SE deals – 1GB to 5GB

These modest data deals are perfect for people who don’t use their phone for
more than messaging, browsing, checking social media apps and getting news
updates while in 4G territory. Obviously, they’re also the cheapest way to get
your hands on the iPhone SE, so they’re ideal if you’re on a shoestring
budget.

The very cheapest iPhone SE deal this month is on iD Mobile, with minuscule
monthly payments of £15.99 that you’ll barely notice leaving your bank
account. You do have to sacrifice unlimited calls and texts for the privilege,
but there are brilliant deals on EE and O2 that lavish you with an endless
talk plan and low monthly costs.

[**5GB deal on
iD**](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=14879965153&a=277673&m=2264&clickref=tr-
mobiledeals-iphonese) – £15.99/month | free upfront | 300 mins & 5000 texts
_([Carphone

## Best iPhone SE deals – 8GB to 16GB

For peace of mind when you’re having some precious screen time away from Wi-
Fi, an 8GB+ deal is your best bet. Anything between that and 16GB is the
perfect mid-level data allowance for the average phone user who enjoys plenty
of screen time on the go.

EE, O2 and Vodafone all have good mid-levels deals at the moment, with
Vodafone’s generous 16GB coming out top as the best value. Just £34 per month
for a hearty 16GB data allowance is pretty perfect in our books.

[**8GB deal on
EE**](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=21373688948&a=277673&m=2264) –
£32.99/month | free upfront | unlimited mins & texts _([Carphone
Warehouse](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=21373688948&a=277673&m=2264))_

[**10GB deal on
O2**](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=21395919195&a=277673&m=2264) –
£35/month | free upfront | unlimited mins & texts _([Carphone
Warehouse](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=21395919195&a=277673&m=2264))_

[**16GB deal on
Vodafone**](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=21509083923&a=277673&m=3202) –
£34/month | free upfront | unlimited mins & texts
_([Buymobiles.net](https://www.awin1.com/pclick.php?p=21509083923&a=277673&m=3202))_
